'''Minty Meat Rolls''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Minty Meat Rolls is obtainable from [[Chef Mao]] at [[Wanmin Restaurant]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Depending on quality, Minty Meat Rolls decreases [[Stamina]] depleted by gliding and sprinting for all party members by '''15'''/'''20'''/'''25'''% for 900 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
